Record.Term: Synthetic Brain Tumor Peptides-Pulsed Autologous Dendritic Cell Vaccine
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Antineoplastic Vaccine/APC Vaccine/Dendritic Cell Vaccine/Synthetic Brain Tumor Peptides-Pulsed Autologous Dendritic Cell Vaccine
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Synthetic Brain Tumor Peptides-Pulsed Autologous Dendritic Cell Vaccine
Record.Synonym: Synthetic Brain Tumor Peptides-Pulsed Autologous Dendritic Cell Vaccine
Record.Description: A cell-based cancer vaccine composed of autologous dendritic cells (DCs) pulsed with synthetic brain tumor peptides with potential immunostimulatory and antineoplastic activities. Upon administration, synthetic brain tumor peptides-pulsed autologous dendritic cell vaccine may stimulate anti-tumoral cytotoxic T lymphocyte (CTL)l and antibody responses against glioma tumor cells, resulting in glioma tumor cell lysis.
